quote: People say nothing is impossible, but I do nothing every day.
author: A.A. Milne

quote: Boredom is the dream bird that hatches the egg of experience. A rustling in the leaves drives him away.
author: Walter Benjamin

quote: The only thing worse than being bored is being boring.
author: Jean Baudrillard

quote: You're a lot better off being scared than being bored.
author: Harvey Mackay

quote: Every hero becomes a bore at last.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
